text:
June 2k, 19$$
Ur. Kenneth Wright
Director of Broadcasting
Box 8l*f>0
The University of Tennessee
Knoxville, Tennessee
Dear Ken:
In order to have something to go with the July
Newsletter, canft you bang out some ideas on a
program or program series that you use at WOT and
return it to Headquarters by return mail? have
one for the TV program and I would like to get the
radio ideas started too.
I'll let you know later about the DeTocqueville
scripts. Frankly, I think they should be considered
but the scripts are on the West Coast yet.
Sincerely yours.
FEStcu
Frank E. Schooley
President
